title: WALKWAY ORB / walkwaycoat
description: This is the third Shivers in the coat quest. It is a challenging orb.

dialogueTree.title: Shivers: "It is harder and harder to reach yo..."
dialogueTree.text: It is harder and harder to reach you... I am not sure how well you'll hear me...

links.title: You: "Please, I want to help you! Where m..."
links.text: Please, I want to help you! Where must I go next?

links.title: Shivers: "Listen within the flower of home… I..."
links.text: Listen within the flower of home… I am lost... Please....

links.title: You: "Can't you just tell me where you ar..."
links.text: Can't you just tell me where you are? Or what you are?

links.title: Shivers: "I am lost and unfound... Listen wit..."
links.text: I am lost and unfound... Listen within the flower of home…

links.title: Shivers: "Forgive me... I only want reunion....."
links.text: Forgive me... I only want reunion... I am struggling to know where... Listen within the flower of home… Please...
